creator: 林一二
title: linonetwo/tw-whiteboard
cpl.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-whiteboard
cpl.name: Whiteboard
cpl.description: Tiny little drawing app in TW, using tldraw. Providing diagram widget and whiteboard view.
cpl.author: linonetwo
cpl.readme:
[[User Manual|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tiddlywiki-whiteboard/]]

# Provides a whiteboard widget, use it like `<$whiteboard tiddler="tiddlerToStoreData" />`
# Tiddler with type `application/tldr` will be parsed as whiteboard, showing whiteboard in tiddler's ViewTemplate
# Provides a whiteboard view, use `ctrl+shift+L` to switch to this view, you can choose a tiddler with type `application/tldr`, and edit it in full screen.
